section.heading: Tax on estates and trusts — “In discretion of grantor” defined.
section.text: As used in this subchapter, the term “in the discretion of the grantor” means in the discretion of the grantor either alone or in conjunction with any person not having a substantial adverse interest in the disposition of the part of the income in question.

annotations.annotation: July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 348, ch. 258, art. I, title IX, § 9
